script: // frappe.listview_settings['Serial No'] = {// add_fields: [ "custom_status"],// get_indicator:function(doc){// if (doc.custom_status === "Hold") {// 			return [__("Hold"), "red", "status,=,Hold"];//     }// if (doc.custom_status === "Delivered") {// 			return [__("Delivered"), "green", "status,=,Delivered"];//     }//     if (doc.custom_status === "Active") {// 			return [__("Active"), "green", "status,=,Active"];//     }//     if (doc.custom_status === "Inactive") {// 			return [__("Inactive"), "gray", "status,=,Inactive"];//     }//  }// }frappe.listview_settings['Serial No'] = {	add_fields: ["item_code", "warehouse", "warranty_expiry_date", "delivery_document_type"],	get_indicator: (doc) => {		if (doc.delivery_document_type) {			return [__("Delivered"), "green", "delivery_document_type,is,set"];		} else if (doc.warranty_expiry_date && frappe.datetime.get_diff(doc.warranty_expiry_date, frappe.datetime.nowdate()) <= 0) {			return [__("Expired"), "red", "warranty_expiry_date,not in,|warranty_expiry_date,<=,Today|delivery_document_type,is,not set"];		} else if (!doc.warehouse) {			return [__("Inactive"), "grey", "warehouse,is,not set"];		} else if (doc.packing_list) {			return [__("Hold"), "red", "packing_list,is,set"];		} else {			return [__("Active"), "green", "delivery_document_type,is,not set"];		}	}};

name: Delivery Note
Get Appointment letter date
Get probation period end date
script: frappe.ui.form.on('Employee', {    date_of_joining(frm) {        var probation_period = cur_frm.doc.probation_period;        var date_of_joining = cur_frm.doc.date_of_joining;        var a;        var b;                var startDate = new Date(date_of_joining);        var probationEndDate = new Date(startDate);        probationEndDate.setFullYear(startDate.getFullYear() + Math.floor((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) / 12));        probationEndDate.setMonth((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) % 12);        probationEndDate.setDate(probationEndDate.getDate() - 1);        var day = probationEndDate.getDate();        var month = probationEndDate.getMonth() + 1;         var year = probationEndDate.getFullYear();        a = `${day < 10 ? '0' : ''}${day}-${month1 < 10 ? '0' : ''}${month}-${year}`;        // console.log(a);        var employmentStartDate = new Date(startDate);        employmentStartDate.setFullYear(startDate.getFullYear() + Math.floor((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) / 12));        employmentStartDate.setMonth((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) % 12);        var day1 = employmentStartDate.getDate();        var month1 = employmentStartDate.getMonth() + 1;         var year1 = employmentStartDate.getFullYear();        b = `${day1 < 10 ? '0' : ''}${day1}-${month1 < 10 ? '0' : ''}${month1}-${year1}`;        // console.log(b);                frm.set_value('probation_period_end_date', a);        frm.refresh_field('probation_period_end_date');        frm.set_value('employment_start_date', b);        frm.refresh_field('employment_start_date');    },    probation_period(frm) {        var probation_period = cur_frm.doc.probation_period;        var date_of_joining = cur_frm.doc.date_of_joining;        var a;        var b;                var startDate = new Date(date_of_joining);        var probationEndDate = new Date(startDate);        probationEndDate.setFullYear(startDate.getFullYear() + Math.floor((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) / 12));        probationEndDate.setMonth((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) % 12);        probationEndDate.setDate(probationEndDate.getDate() - 1);        var day = probationEndDate.getDate();        var month = probationEndDate.getMonth() + 1;         var year = probationEndDate.getFullYear();        a = `${day < 10 ? '0' : ''}${day}-${month1 < 10 ? '0' : ''}${month}-${year}`;        // console.log(a);        var employmentStartDate = new Date(startDate);        employmentStartDate.setFullYear(startDate.getFullYear() + Math.floor((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) / 12));        employmentStartDate.setMonth((startDate.getMonth() + probation_period) % 12);        var day1 = employmentStartDate.getDate();        var month1 = employmentStartDate.getMonth() + 1;         var year1 = employmentStartDate.getFullYear();        b = `${day1 < 10 ? '0' : ''}${day1}-${month1 < 10 ? '0' : ''}${month1}-${year1}`;        // console.log(b);                frm.set_value('probation_period_end_date', a);        frm.refresh_field('probation_period_end_date');        frm.set_value('employment_start_date', b);        frm.refresh_field('employment_start_date');    }})
